name: A normal game
description:
Hello welcome to the page of a normal game!

This game was not made in 1 week during the first community game jam which did not have the theme "The Game is a liar" and the creator of this game does not thank the people who participated in the implementation of this Game jam !

This game is like any other normal game, you will have to free a princess by crossing 4 different levels!  As in any normal game, you will have to go to the right, pick up coins, etc...

I hope you will enjoy playing this game as with all other normal games.

If you have any problems with the web file you can download the windows/linux zip file.

Controls : 

jump : A / space 

move : arrows / gamepad axis
